about_the_game:
Supermarket is a fun and dynamic co-op multiplayer simulation where you and your friends dive into the world of retail management. Work together to build, run, and grow a bustling supermarket from the ground up!

Key Features

  • Co-op Play: Work together with friends to manage the store.

  • Store Design: Plan your store layout for efficiency and style.

  • Stock Management: Order, organize, and restock products.

  • Customer Service: Handle checkout and keep shoppers happy.

  • Market Strategy: Set prices, track trends, and maximize profits.

  • Expansion: Grow your store, add new sections, and upgrade.

  • Challenges: Deal with supply issues, rushes, and customer needs.

  • Teamwork: Collaborate on tasks to keep the store running smoothly.

  • Progression: Unlock new features as your store grows.

Design and customize your store layout, ensuring everything from product placement to store flow is optimized for efficiency and a great customer experience. Each player has their role—whether it’s stocking shelves, handling checkout, or managing the inventory behind the scenes.

Use the in-game computer to place stock orders and handle deliveries. Then, unload and organize the goods in the storage area, sorting them into shelves, fridges, and freezers. The team must coordinate to keep things running smoothly.

At the checkout, players work together to scan items, process payments, and ensure customers have an enjoyable shopping experience. But it's not just about keeping the shelves full—keep an eye on market trends, set competitive prices, and figure out how to make the most profit without losing customer loyalty.

As your profits grow, reinvest into your store—expand the building, add new sections, upgrade equipment, and adapt to the changing demands of customers. Be ready for unexpected challenges that require teamwork, such as supply shortages or rush-hour crowds.

In Supermarket, success depends on how well you and your team work together. Will you thrive as a cooperative business or struggle to stay afloat? The future of your supermarket is in your hands!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600@ 3.1 GHz or AMD R5 1600X @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: Run your own supermarket solo or co-op! Manage stock, set prices, process payments, increase staff and grow your business, handle online orders, ensure security, and compete with the local market to become the top store.
